casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Owen JACOBS 126PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 22, 2017 Paul F. Herzog, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Jacobs, John Owen. Elizabeth J. Weese, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of June 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of June 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 9th day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
